<!DOCTYPE html>

  <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
  <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/font-awesome@4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tesseract.js@5.1.0/dist/tesseract.min.js"></script>
  <style>

    /* éšè—æ»šåŠ¨æ¡ä½†å…è®¸æ»šåŠ¨ */

      <span class="text-xs text-slate-500 bg-slate-100 px-2 py-1 rounded">æœ¬åœ°è¿ç®— Â· ä¸ä¸Šä¼ æœåŠ¡å™¨</span>
    </div>
  </header>

  <main class="flex-grow container mx-auto py-6 px-4 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
    
    <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-6 flex flex-col h-full">
      <h2 class="font-semibold mb-4 text-slate-700"><i class="fa fa-upload text-blue-500 mr-2"></i>ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡</h2>
      
      <div id="dropArea" class="flex-1 border-2 border-dashed border-slate-300 rounded-lg flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-6 transition-colors cursor-pointer min-h-[200px] relative">
        <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*" class="hidden">
        
        <div id="uploadPrompt" class="text-center">
          <i class="fa fa-cloud-upload text-4xl text-slate-300 mb-3"></i>
          <p class="text-sm text-slate-500">ç‚¹å‡»æˆ–æ‹–æ‹½å›¾ç‰‡è‡³æ­¤</p>
        </div>

        <img id="previewImg" class="hidden max-h-64 max-w-full object-contain rounded shadow-sm z-10">
        
        <button id="clearBtn" class="hidden absolute top-2 right-2 bg-red-500 text-white w-6 h-6 rounded-full hover:bg-red-600 z-20 items-center justify-center text-xs">
          <i class="fa fa-times"></i>
        </button>

      <div id="progressBox" class="hidden mt-4">
        <div class="flex justify-between text-xs text-slate-500 mb-1">
          <span>æ­£åœ¨è¯†åˆ«...</span>
          <span id="progressText">0%</span>
        </div>
        <div class="h-2 bg-slate-100 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
          <div id="progressBar" class="h-full bg-blue-500 transition-all duration-300 w-0"></div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <button id="runBtn" disabled class="mt-4 w-full py-3 rounded-lg font-medium text-white bg-slate-300 cursor-not-allowed transition-colors flex justify-center items-center">
        å¼€å§‹è¯†åˆ«
      </button>
    </div>

    <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-6 flex flex-col h-full">
      <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
        <h2 class="font-semibold text-slate-700"><i class="fa fa-file-text text-emerald-500 mr-2"></i>è¯†åˆ«ç»“æœ</h2>
        <button id="copyBtn" class="text-sm text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700 disabled:text-slate-300" disabled>
          <i class="fa fa-copy mr-1"></i>å¤åˆ¶
        </button>
      </div>

      <div class="flex-grow relative bg-slate-50 rounded-lg border border-slate-200">
        <textarea id="resultBox" class="w-full h-full p-4 bg-transparent resize-none focus:outline-none text-sm leading-relaxed" 
          placeholder="ç­‰å¾…è¯†åˆ«..." readonly></textarea>
        
        <div id="toast" class="absolute bottom-4 right-4 bg-slate-800 text-white text-xs px-3 py-1.5 rounded opacity-0 transition-opacity pointer-events-none">
          å·²å¤åˆ¶
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </main>

  <script>
    // å…ƒç´ å¼•ç”¨
    const els = {
      dropArea: document.getElementById('dropArea'),
      fileInput: document.getElementById('fileInput'),
      previewImg: document.getElementById('previewImg'),
      uploadPrompt: document.getElementById('uploadPrompt'),
      clearBtn: document.getElementById('clearBtn'),
      runBtn: document.getElementById('runBtn'),
      progressBox: document.getElementById('progressBox'),
      progressBar: document.getElementById('progressBar'),
      progressText: document.getElementById('progressText'),
      resultBox: document.getElementById('resultBox'),
      copyBtn: document.getElementById('copyBtn'),
      toast: document.getElementById('toast')
    };

    let currentFile = null;

    // --- å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°ï¼šæ¸…ç†æ–‡æœ¬ç©ºæ ¼ ---
    // 1. å»é™¤ä¸­æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´çš„ç©ºæ ¼
    // 2. å°†å¤šä¸ªç©ºè¡Œåˆå¹¶ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæ¢è¡Œ
    // 3. å»é™¤æ¯è¡Œé¦–å°¾ç©ºæ ¼
    function cleanText(text) {
      return text
        .replace(/([^\x00-\xff])\s+([^\x00-\xff])/g, '$1$2') // å»é™¤æ±‰å­—é—´ç©ºæ ¼
        .replace(/[\r\n]+/g, '\n')  // åˆå¹¶å¤šä¸ªæ¢è¡Œç¬¦
        .split('\n').map(line => line.trim()).filter(line => line.length > 0).join('\n') // å»ç©ºè¡Œå¹¶Trimæ¯ä¸€è¡Œ
        .trim();
    }

    // --- äº¤äº’é€»è¾‘ ---

    // æ‹–æ‹½æ•ˆæœ
    ['dragenter', 'dragover'].forEach(e => els.dropArea.addEventListener(e, (ev) => {
      ev.preventDefault(); els.dropArea.classList.add('drag-active');
    }));
    ['dragleave', 'drop'].forEach(e => els.dropArea.addEventListener(e, (ev) => {
      ev.preventDefault(); els.dropArea.classList.remove('drag-active');
    }));

    // æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†
    const handleFile = (file) => {
      if (!file || !file.type.startsWith('image/')) return alert('è¯·ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶');
      currentFile = file;
      
      const reader = new FileReader();
      reader.onload = (e) => {
        els.previewImg.src = e.target.result;
        els.previewImg.classList.remove('hidden');
        els.clearBtn.classList.remove('hidden');
        els.uploadPrompt.classList.add('hidden');
        
        // æ¿€æ´»æŒ‰é’®
        els.runBtn.disabled = false;
        els.runBtn.className = 'mt-4 w-full py-3 rounded-lg font-medium text-white bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 transition-colors shadow-md hover:shadow-lg';
        
        // é‡ç½®ç»“æœåŒº
        els.resultBox.value = '';
        els.copyBtn.disabled = true;
        els.progressBox.classList.add('hidden');
      };
      reader.readAsDataURL(file);
    };

    els.dropArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => handleFile(e.dataTransfer.files[0]));
    els.dropArea.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if(e.target !== els.clearBtn && e.target.parentNode !== els.clearBtn) els.fileInput.click();
    });
    els.fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => handleFile(e.target.files[0]));

    // æ¸…é™¤å›¾ç‰‡
    els.clearBtn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      e.stopPropagation();
      currentFile = null;
      els.previewImg.classList.add('hidden');
      els.clearBtn.classList.add('hidden');
      els.uploadPrompt.classList.remove('hidden');
      els.runBtn.disabled = true;
      els.runBtn.className = 'mt-4 w-full py-3 rounded-lg font-medium text-white bg-slate-300 cursor-not-allowed transition-colors';
      els.fileInput.value = '';
    });

    // æ‰§è¡ŒOCR
    els.runBtn.addEventListener('click', async () => {
      if (!currentFile) return;

      els.progressBox.classList.remove('hidden');
      els.runBtn.disabled = true;
      els.runBtn.classList.add('opacity-75');
      
      try {
        const { data: { text } } = await Tesseract.recognize(currentFile, 'chi_sim', {
          logger: m => {
            if (m.status === 'recognizing text') {
              const pct = Math.floor(m.progress * 100) + '%';
              els.progressBar.style.width = pct;
              els.progressText.innerText = pct;
            }
          }
        });

        // å…³é”®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ cleanText å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
        const finalText = cleanText(text);
        
        els.resultBox.value = finalText || 'æœªèƒ½è¯†åˆ«å‡ºæ–‡å­—';
        els.copyBtn.disabled = !finalText;
      } catch (err) {
        els.resultBox.value = 'è¯†åˆ«å‡ºé”™: ' + err.message;
      } finally {
        els.runBtn.disabled = false;
        els.runBtn.classList.remove('opacity-75');
      }
    });

    // å¤åˆ¶åŠŸèƒ½
    els.copyBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      els.resultBox.select();
      document.execCommand('copy');
      els.toast.classList.remove('opacity-0');
      setTimeout(() => els.toast.classList.add('opacity-0'), 2000);
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

import fitz  # PyMuPDFåº“
import os

def pdf_to_high_res_jpg(pdf_path, output_folder, dpi=600):
    """
    å°†PDFæ–‡ä»¶çš„æ¯ä¸€é¡µè½¬æ¢ä¸ºé«˜åˆ†è¾¨ç‡JPGå›¾ç‰‡
    
    å‚æ•°:
        pdf_path (str): PDFæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
        output_folder (str): è¾“å‡ºå›¾ç‰‡çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
        dpi (int): å›¾ç‰‡åˆ†è¾¨ç‡ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º600
    """
    # åˆ›å»ºè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼ˆå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
    os.makedirs(output_folder, exist_ok=True)
    
    try:
        # æ‰“å¼€PDFæ–‡ä»¶
        pdf_document = fitz.open(pdf_path)
        print(f"æˆåŠŸæ‰“å¼€PDFæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå…±{len(pdf_document)}é¡µ")
        
        # éå†æ¯ä¸€é¡µ
        for page_number in range(len(pdf_document)):
            # è·å–å½“å‰é¡µ
            page = pdf_document[page_number]
            
            # è®¾ç½®ç¼©æ”¾å› å­ï¼Œ72DPIæ˜¯é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼Œè¦å¾—åˆ°600DPIéœ€è¦ç¼©æ”¾600/72å€
            zoom = dpi / 72
            mat = fitz.Matrix(zoom, zoom)
            
            # å°†é¡µé¢è½¬æ¢ä¸ºåƒç´ å›¾
            pix = page.get_pixmap(matrix=mat)
            
            # ç”Ÿæˆè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶åï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ï¼špage_001.jpgï¼‰
            output_filename = f"page_{page_number + 1:03d}.jpg"
            output_path = os.path.join(output_folder, output_filename)
            
            # ä¿å­˜ä¸ºJPG
            pix.save(output_path)
            print(f"å·²ä¿å­˜: {output_path}")
        
        # å…³é—­PDFæ–‡ä»¶
        pdf_document.close()
        print("è½¬æ¢å®Œæˆï¼")
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"è½¬æ¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºé”™: {str(e)}")

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
if __name__ == "__main__":
    # è¾“å…¥PDFæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
    input_pdf =     pdf_file_path = "First Aid Cases For The USMLE Step 1 (Tao Le, Richard Giovane) (Z-Library).pdf"  # æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºä½ çš„PDFæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„

    # è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹è·¯å¾„
    output_dir = "pdf_pages_jpg"
    
    # è½¬æ¢ä¸º600DPIçš„JPG
    pdf_to_high_res_jpg(input_pdf, output_dir, dpi=600)

Office ï¼ˆ ppt wordå¿«é€Ÿè½¬æ¢PDF-Office.vbs ï¼‰ On Error Resume Next MsgBox "Start converting PPT and Word files into PDF format. Please ensure Office or WPS is installed. Please wait...", vbInformation, "Conversion Start" Const wdExportFormatPDF = 17 Dim oWord, ppt, fso, isOffice, isWPS ' åˆå§‹åŒ–å˜é‡ Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject") isOffice = False isWPS = False Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("KWPS.Application") Set ppt = CreateObject("KWPP.application") If IsObject(oWord) And IsObject(ppt) Then isOffice = True Else If IsObject(oWord) Then oWord.Quit If IsObject(ppt) Then ppt.Quit Set oWord = Nothing Set ppt = Nothing Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("Word.Application") Set ppt = CreateObject("PowerPoint.application") If IsObject(oWord) And IsObject(ppt) Then isWPS = True Else ' ä¸¤ç§åŠå…¬è½¯ä»¶éƒ½æœªå®‰è£… If IsObject(oWord) Then oWord.Quit If IsObject(ppt) Then ppt.Quit Set oWord = Nothing Set ppt = Nothing Set fso = Nothing MsgBox "Failed to find Office or WPS. Please install one of them first.", vbCritical, "Error" WScript.Quit End If End If ' å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ ProcessFolder fso.GetFolder(".") ' æ¸…ç†å¯¹è±¡ If IsObject(oWord) Then oWord.Quit Set oWord = Nothing End If If IsObject(ppt) Then ppt.Quit Set ppt = Nothing End If Set fso = Nothing MsgBox "PPT and Word files have been successfully converted into PDF format!", vbInformation, "Conversion Complete" Sub ProcessFolder(folder) Dim ff, subFolder, pdfPath For Each ff In folder.Files ' å¤„ç†Wordæ–‡ä»¶ (.doc, .docx) ä¸”ä¸æ˜¯ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶ If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".doc" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 5)) = ".docx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then pdfPath = Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf" Set oDoc = oWord.Documents.Open(ff.Path) oDoc.ExportAsFixedFormat pdfPath, wdExportFormatPDF oDoc.Close Set oDoc = Nothing End If ' å¤„ç†PowerPointæ–‡ä»¶ (.ppt, .pptx) ä¸”ä¸æ˜¯ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶ If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".ppt" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 5)) = ".pptx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then pdfPath = Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf" Set pptfile = ppt.Presentations.Open(ff.Path, False, False, False) pptfile.SaveAs pdfPath, 32, False pptfile.Close Set pptfile = Nothing End If Next ' é€’å½’å¤„ç†å­æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ For Each subFolder In folder.SubFolders ProcessFolder subFolder Next End Sub WPS ( ppt wordå¿«é€Ÿè½¬æ¢PDF-WPS.vbs ) On Error Resume Next MsgBox "å¼€å§‹è½¬æ¢PPTå’ŒWordæ–‡ä»¶ä¸ºPDFæ ¼å¼ï¼Œè¯·ç¨å€™..." On Error Resume Next
MsgBox "Start converting PPT and Word files into PDF format. Please ensure Office or WPS is installed. Please wait...", vbInformation, "Conversion Start"

Const wdExportFormatPDF = 17
Dim oWord, ppt, fso, isOffice, isWPS

' åˆå§‹åŒ–å˜é‡
Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
isOffice = False
isWPS = False

Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("KWPS.Application")
Set ppt = CreateObject("KWPP.application")
If IsObject(oWord) And IsObject(ppt) Then
    isOffice = True
Else
    If IsObject(oWord) Then oWord.Quit
    If IsObject(ppt) Then ppt.Quit
    Set oWord = Nothing
    Set ppt = Nothing
    
    Set oWord = WScript.CreateObject("Word.Application")
    Set ppt = CreateObject("PowerPoint.application")
    If IsObject(oWord) And IsObject(ppt) Then
        isWPS = True
    Else
        ' ä¸¤ç§åŠå…¬è½¯ä»¶éƒ½æœªå®‰è£…
        If IsObject(oWord) Then oWord.Quit
        If IsObject(ppt) Then ppt.Quit
        Set oWord = Nothing
        Set ppt = Nothing
        Set fso = Nothing
        MsgBox "Failed to find Office or WPS. Please install one of them first.", vbCritical, "Error"
        WScript.Quit
    End If
End If

' å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
ProcessFolder fso.GetFolder(".")

' æ¸…ç†å¯¹è±¡
If IsObject(oWord) Then
    oWord.Quit
    Set oWord = Nothing
End If
If IsObject(ppt) Then
    ppt.Quit
    Set ppt = Nothing
End If
Set fso = Nothing

MsgBox "PPT and Word files have been successfully converted into PDF format!", vbInformation, "Conversion Complete"

Sub ProcessFolder(folder)
    Dim ff, subFolder, pdfPath
    
    For Each ff In folder.Files
        ' å¤„ç†Wordæ–‡ä»¶ (.doc, .docx) ä¸”ä¸æ˜¯ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
        If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".doc" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 5)) = ".docx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then
            pdfPath = Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf"
            Set oDoc = oWord.Documents.Open(ff.Path)
            oDoc.ExportAsFixedFormat pdfPath, wdExportFormatPDF
            oDoc.Close
            Set oDoc = Nothing
        End If
        
        ' å¤„ç†PowerPointæ–‡ä»¶ (.ppt, .pptx) ä¸”ä¸æ˜¯ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
        If (LCase(Right(ff.Name, 4)) = ".ppt" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name, 5)) = ".pptx") And Left(ff.Name, 1) <> "~" Then
            pdfPath = Left(ff.Path, InStrRev(ff.Path, ".")) & "pdf"
            Set pptfile = ppt.Presentations.Open(ff.Path, False, False, False)
            pptfile.SaveAs pdfPath, 32, False
            pptfile.Close
            Set pptfile = Nothing
        End If
    Next
    
    ' é€’å½’å¤„ç†å­æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
    For Each subFolder In folder.SubFolders
        ProcessFolder subFolder
    Next
End Sub

import re
from playwright.sync_api import Playwright, sync_playwright, expect

def run(playwright: Playwright) -> None:
    browser = playwright.chromium.launch(headless=True)
    page = browser.new_page(device_scale_factor=4)
    page.goto("https://kaoshi.wjx.top/vm/e0bKYQs.aspx#")
    
    page.wait_for_timeout(2000)
    cnt=0
    for each in page.query_selector_all("#fieldset1 > div"):
        each.screenshot(path=f"img/{cnt}.png") 
        cnt+=1
    
    page.close()
    browser.close()


with sync_playwright() as playwright:
    run(playwright)

import pubchempy as pcp from pymol import cmd import os def download_sdf(compound_identifier, output_file): try: # å°è¯•æ ¹æ®æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦è·å–åŒ–åˆç‰© if isinstance(compound_identifier, int): compound = pcp.Compound.from_cid(compound_identifier) else: results = pcp.get_compounds(compound_identifier, 'name') if results: compound = results[0] else: print(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸ {compound_identifier} åŒ¹é…çš„åŒ–åˆç‰©ã€‚") return # ä¸‹è½½ SDF æ–‡ä»¶ sdf_content = compound.canonical_smiles sdf = pcp.get_sdf(compound.cid) with open(output_file, 'w') as file: file.write(sdf) print(f"SDF æ–‡ä»¶å·²æˆåŠŸä¿å­˜åˆ° {output_file}") except Exception as e: print(f"ä¸‹è½½è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯: {e}") if __name__ == "__main__": # è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºä½ æƒ³è¦æŸ¥è¯¢çš„åŒ–åˆç‰©åç§°æˆ– CID compound_identifier = "aspirin" output_file = compound_identifier + ".sdf" download_sdf(compound_identifier, output_file) # ä½¿ç”¨ PyMOL åŠ è½½ SDF æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶è¿›è¡Œåç»­å¤„ç† cmd.load(output_file) # ä¿å­˜ä¸º PDB æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰ cmd.save(compound_identifier + ".pdb", state=0) cmd.quit() # åˆ é™¤ä¸´æ—¶ SDF æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰ #os.remove(output_file)

æœ¬ä»£ç ç”¨äºä»pubchemä¸‹è½½å°åˆ†å­(é˜¿å¸åŒ¹æ—)ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è‡ªåŠ¨è½¬æ¢æˆpymolçš„pdbæ ¼å¼

import pubchempy as pcp
from pymol import cmd
import os
def download_sdf(compound_identifier, output_file):
    try:
        # å°è¯•æ ¹æ®æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦è·å–åŒ–åˆç‰©
        if isinstance(compound_identifier, int):
            compound = pcp.Compound.from_cid(compound_identifier)
        else:
            results = pcp.get_compounds(compound_identifier, 'name')
            if results:
                compound = results[0]
            else:
                print(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸ {compound_identifier} åŒ¹é…çš„åŒ–åˆç‰©ã€‚")
                return

        # ä¸‹è½½ SDF æ–‡ä»¶
        sdf_content = compound.canonical_smiles
        sdf = pcp.get_sdf(compound.cid)
        with open(output_file, 'w') as file:
            file.write(sdf)
        print(f"SDF æ–‡ä»¶å·²æˆåŠŸä¿å­˜åˆ° {output_file}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"ä¸‹è½½è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯: {e}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    # è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºä½ æƒ³è¦æŸ¥è¯¢çš„åŒ–åˆç‰©åç§°æˆ– CID
    compound_identifier = "aspirin"
    output_file = compound_identifier + ".sdf"
    download_sdf(compound_identifier, output_file)
    # ä½¿ç”¨ PyMOL åŠ è½½ SDF æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶è¿›è¡Œåç»­å¤„ç†
    cmd.load(output_file)
    # ä¿å­˜ä¸º PDB æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
    cmd.save(compound_identifier + ".pdb", state=0)
    cmd.quit()
    # åˆ é™¤ä¸´æ—¶ SDF æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
    #os.remove(output_file)

import re
from playwright.async_api import Playwright, async_playwright
#from playwright.sync_api import Playwright, sync_playwright, expect
import random

import asyncio
import time
def random_int(min=2, max=4):
    random.seed(time.time())    
    return str(random.randint(min, max))

async def mouse_random_move(page):
    # æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé¼ æ ‡éšæœºå¹³æ»‘ç§»åŠ¨
    for i in range(5):
        await page.mouse.move(random.randint(0, 1000), random.randint(0, 1000))
        await asyncio.sleep(0.1)
    # æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé¼ æ ‡éšæœºåœç•™
    #time.sleep(random.randint(0,1))
    # é¼ æ ‡æ»šè½®

async def run(browser) -> None:
    
    context = await browser.new_context()
    page = await context.new_page()
    await page.goto("https://www.wjx.cn/vm/Q0x3Wuq.aspx")
    await page.get_by_text("ç”·").click()
    await page.get_by_text("å¤§ä¸‰").click()
    await page.get_by_text("1000-").click()
    await page.locator("div").filter(has_text=re.compile(r"^å…¨éƒ¨æ¥è‡ªå®¶åº­éƒ¨åˆ†æ¥è‡ªå®¶åº­ï¼Œéƒ¨åˆ†é è‡ªå·±èµšå–å…¨éƒ¨é è‡ªå·±èµšå–$")).get_by_role("link").nth(1).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("div").filter(has_text=re.compile(r"^300ä»¥ä¸‹300-600600-10001000ä»¥ä¸Š$")).get_by_role("link").nth(1).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("div").filter(has_text=re.compile(r"^æ— 1-200200-500500ä»¥ä¸Š$")).get_by_role("link").nth(2).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("div").filter(has_text=re.compile(r"^å®ä½“åº—ç½‘è´­$")).get_by_role("link").first.click()
    await page.locator("div").filter(has_text=re.compile(r"^100ä»¥ä¸‹100-500500-10001000ä»¥ä¸Š$")).get_by_role("link").nth(3).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("div").filter(has_text=re.compile(r"^æ— 200ä»¥ä¸‹200-500500-10001000ä»¥ä¸Š$")).get_by_role("link").nth(2).click()
    await page.locator("#div10").get_by_role("link").nth(2).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div11").get_by_role("link").nth(1).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div12").get_by_role("link").first.click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div13").get_by_role("link").nth(1).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div14").get_by_role("link").nth(2).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div15").get_by_role("link").nth(1).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div16").get_by_role("link").nth(2).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div17").get_by_role("link").nth(1).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("div:nth-child(2) > .jqcheckwrapper > .jqcheck").first.click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("div:nth-child(5) > .jqcheckwrapper > .jqcheck").first.click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("div:nth-child(7) > .jqcheckwrapper > .jqcheck").click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div19").get_by_role("link").nth(3).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div20").get_by_role("link").nth(1).click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div20").get_by_role("link").first.click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div21 > .ui-controlgroup > div:nth-child(2) > .jqcheckwrapper > .jqcheck").click()
    await mouse_random_move(page)
    await page.locator("#div21 > .ui-controlgroup > div:nth-child(4) > .jqcheckwrapper > .jqcheck").click()
    await page.get_by_text("æäº¤").click()
    await page.wait_for_function("window.location.href !== 'https://www.wjx.cn/vm/Q0x3Wuq.aspx'")
    await page.wait_for_timeout(3000)
    await page.close()
    await context.close()

async def main() -> None:
    async with async_playwright() as p:
        browser = await  p.chromium.launch(headless=True)
        tasks = []
        for i in range(6):
            tasks.append(run(browser))
        titles=await asyncio.gather(*tasks)
        for title in titles:  
            print(title) 
        await browser.close()
        
if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(main())

# %% ###é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼Œå…ˆæŠŠæ–‡ç« å…¨éƒ¨å¤åˆ¶åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªpaper.txtæ–‡æœ¬ä¸­ ###å…ˆè·å–æ‰€æœ‰PMID: åé¢çš„æ•°å­— import re import pandas as pd import numpy as np proxies = {"http": "http://127.0.0.1:8089"} pm=pd.read_csv('paper.txt',header=None) # to list pm=pm[0].tolist() # %% import requests from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor def fetch_pmid(pmid): max_retries = 300 # è®¾ç½®æœ€å¤§é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•° for attempt in range(max_retries): url = 'https://api.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/lit/ctxp/v1/pubmed/?format=medline&id={}'.format(pmid) print(url) print("-------requests start--------------") res = requests.get(url,proxies=proxies) print("-------requests end--------------") print(res) if res.status_code == 200: res.close() return res.text + "\n" else: print(f"Request failed, retrying... (attempt {attempt + 1}/{max_retries})") print(f"Failed to fetch PMID {pmid} after {max_retries} attempts.") return "" cita = [] # è®¾ç½®çº¿ç¨‹æ•°ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè®¾ç½®ä¸º4ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´ num_threads = 32 with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=num_threads) as executor: # ä½¿ç”¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å¹¶è¡Œå¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªpmid results = list(executor.map(fetch_pmid, pm)) cita.extend(results) # æ›¿æ¢å¤„ç† # %% cita = [y.replace("\r", "") for y in cita] cita = [y + "\n" for y in cita] f=open("citation.nbib","w",encoding='utf-8') f.writelines(cita) f.close()

ä»£ç†ä½¿ç”¨8089ç«¯å£ï¼Œé€‚é…clash
ä½¿ç”¨ï¼šåŒç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºpaper.txtï¼Œä¸€è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªå¡«å†™ä¸€ä¸ªPMID
ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªcitation.nbibæ ¼å¼çš„æ–‡ä»¶


# %%
###é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼Œå…ˆæŠŠæ–‡ç« å…¨éƒ¨å¤åˆ¶åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªpaper.txtæ–‡æœ¬ä¸­
###å…ˆè·å–æ‰€æœ‰PMID: åé¢çš„æ•°å­—
import re
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

proxies = {"http": "http://127.0.0.1:8089"}

pm=pd.read_csv('paper.txt',header=None)
# to list
pm=pm[0].tolist()


# %%
import requests
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor

def fetch_pmid(pmid):
    max_retries = 300  # è®¾ç½®æœ€å¤§é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
    for attempt in range(max_retries):
        url = 'https://api.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/lit/ctxp/v1/pubmed/?format=medline&id={}'.format(pmid)
        print(url)
        print("-------requests start--------------")
        res = requests.get(url,proxies=proxies)
        print("-------requests end--------------")
        print(res)
        if res.status_code == 200:
            res.close()
            return res.text + "\n"

        else:
            print(f"Request failed, retrying... (attempt {attempt + 1}/{max_retries})")
    
    print(f"Failed to fetch PMID {pmid} after {max_retries} attempts.")
    return ""

cita = []

# è®¾ç½®çº¿ç¨‹æ•°ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè®¾ç½®ä¸º4ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´
num_threads = 32

with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=num_threads) as executor:
    # ä½¿ç”¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å¹¶è¡Œå¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªpmid
    results = list(executor.map(fetch_pmid, pm))

cita.extend(results)

# æ›¿æ¢å¤„ç†

# %%
cita = [y.replace("\r", "") for y in cita]
cita = [y + "\n" for y in cita]
f=open("citation.nbib","w",encoding='utf-8')
f.writelines(cita)
f.close()

import netifaces
import os
# è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç½‘ç»œæ¥å£
interfaces = netifaces.interfaces()

for iface in interfaces:
    # è·å–æ¥å£çš„åœ°å€ä¿¡æ¯
    addresses = netifaces.ifaddresses(iface)
    # æå– IPv4 åœ°å€
    if netifaces.AF_INET in addresses:
        for addr_info in addresses[netifaces.AF_INET]:
            ip = addr_info.get('addr')
            if ip:
                print(f"é€‚é…å™¨ {iface} çš„IPåœ°å€: {ip}")
                os.system('curl --data "opr=pwdLogin&userName=è´¦å·&pwd=å¯†ç &rememberPwd=1" http://1.1.1.2/ac_portal/login.php  --interface ' + ip)

GWASfilename = glob_wildcards("../../SMR/input/{file}").file

# å®šä¹‰ all è§„åˆ™ï¼Œç”¨äºæŒ‡å®šæ•´ä¸ªæµç¨‹çš„æœ€ç»ˆè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶

        # è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„

summary:
import re
from playwright.sync_api import Playwright, sync_playwright, expect
import time
import os

import hmac
import hashlib

def totp(key, t, digits=6):
    step = 30
    t = int(t / step)
    key = key.encode()
    counter = t.to_bytes(8, 'big')
    h = hmac.new(key, counter, hashlib.sha1).digest()
    offset = h[-1] & 0x0f
    truncated = h[offset:offset + 4]
    code = int.from_bytes(truncated, 'big') & 0x7fffffff
    code = str(code % 10 ** digits).zfill(digits)
    return code

# %%


def run(playwright: Playwright) -> None:
    browser = playwright.chromium.launch(headless=True)
    context = browser.new_context()
    page = context.new_page()
    page.goto("https://webvpn.stu.edu.cn/portal/#!/login")
    page.locator("#Calc input[type=\"text\"]").fill("æ ¡å›­ç½‘è´¦å·")
    page.locator("#loginPwd").click()
    page.locator("#loginPwd").fill("æ ¡å›­ç½‘å¯†ç ")
    page.locator("span").filter(has_text="æˆ‘å·²é˜…è¯»å¹¶åŒæ„").locator("div").first.click()
    page.get_by_role("button", name="ç™»å½•").click()
    page.locator("#app_dialog_container").get_by_role("textbox").fill(str(totp("å¡«å†™ä½ çš„TOTPå¯†é’¥", time.time())))
    page.get_by_role("button", name="ç¡®å®š").click()
    # ---------------------
    # è·å–cookieå€¼
    cookies = page.context.cookies()
    for cookie in cookies:
        print(f"{cookie['name']}: {cookie['value']}")
        if cookie['name'] == "TWFID":
            TWFID = cookie['value']
    
    
    url="https://webvpn.stu.edu.cn/portal/shortcut.html?twfid="+TWFID+"&url=http://bilibili-com-s.webvpn.stu.edu.cn%3A8118"
    os.system('start msedge "'+url+'"')
    # ---------------------
    context.close()
    browser.close()


with sync_playwright() as playwright:
    run(playwright)

summary:
import os
import ecdsa

# ç”Ÿæˆç§é’¥å’Œå…¬é’¥
def generate_keys():
    # ä½¿ç”¨secp256k1æ›²çº¿ç”Ÿæˆå¯†é’¥å¯¹
    sk = ecdsa.SigningKey.generate(curve=ecdsa.SECP256k1)
    vk = sk.get_verifying_key()
    return sk, vk

# å¯¹æ¶ˆæ¯è¿›è¡Œç­¾å
def sign_message(private_key, message):
    return private_key.sign(message)

# éªŒè¯ç­¾å
def verify_signature(public_key, message, signature):
    return public_key.verify(signature, message)

# %%
private_key, public_key = generate_keys()
# ç®€å•æ¶ˆæ¯
message = b"Hello, ECDSA!"

# ç­¾åæ¶ˆæ¯
signature = sign_message(private_key, message)
print(f"Signature: {signature.hex()}")


# %% 
sig='adee313bebf78c1bd4a9719e0ad9aa871ff8195788ad2d7510f35e1ef0ce00a6cbfea518e4ea1716a729c7313a52da8b0c57ff0e0f97251ea604beef3890f699'
message = b"Hello, ECDSA!"
signature = bytes.fromhex(sig)
print(verify_signature(public_key, message, signature))   #éªŒè¯ç­¾å

Single Sign On System

import os
url="https://sso.stu.edu.cn/login?service=http://localhost:8080"
os.system('start msedge "'+url+'"')

import http.server
import socketserver
import urllib.parse
import threading
import requests
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# å®šä¹‰å…¨å±€å˜é‡å­˜å‚¨ticket
ticket = None
username = None
# è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†ç±»
class MyHandler(http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler):
    def log_message(self, format, *args):
        pass  # é‡å†™æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸æ‰§è¡Œä»»ä½•æ“ä½œ

    def do_GET(self):
        global ticket, httpd, username
        # è§£æè¯·æ±‚è·¯å¾„çš„å‚æ•°
        parsed_path = urllib.parse.urlparse(self.path)
        query_params = urllib.parse.parse_qs(parsed_path.query)
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ticketå‚æ•°
        if 'ticket' in query_params:
            ticket = query_params['ticket'][0]
        
        # å‘é€å“åº”
        self.send_response(200)
        self.end_headers()
        self.wfile.write(b"Ticket received...")
        vurl="https://sso.stu.edu.cn/serviceValidate?service=http://localhost:8080&ticket="+ticket
        headers={'Connection':'close'}
        requests.adapters.DEFAULT_RETRIES = 5
        response = requests.get(vurl, headers=headers, verify=False)
        root = ET.fromstring(response.text)
        if root[0].tag.endswith('authenticationSuccess'):
            print('Login success, you can close the browser now ç™»é™†æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥å…³é—­æµè§ˆå™¨äº†')
            print('username:', root[0][0].text)
            username = root[0][0].text
            response.close()
            threading.Thread(target=httpd.shutdown).start()
        else:
            print('Login failed, please try again ç™»é™†å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•')
            print('error:', root[0][0].text)
        # å…³é—­æœåŠ¡å™¨
# å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨
def run_server():
    global httpd
    port = 8080
    handler = MyHandler
    with socketserver.TCPServer(("", port), handler) as httpd:
        print(f"Verifying login at https://sso.stu.edu.cn/login?service=http://localhost:8080")
        httpd.serve_forever()
run_server()


Users =['ç”¨æˆ·å']

if username in Users:
    print('Login success, welcome to use this script ç™»é™†æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬è„šæœ¬')
else:
    print('No permission to use this script æ²¡æœ‰æƒé™ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬è„šæœ¬')
    os.system('pause')
    exit()

@ECHO OFF
REM å¯åŠ¨å»¶æ—¶å˜é‡
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:LoginCheck
for /F %%i in ( 'curl -I -m 10 -o /dev/null -s -w %%{http_code} www.baidu.com' ) do ( set http_code=%%i )
if /i %http_code% neq 200 (
	curl --data "opr=pwdLogin&userName=???&pwd=???&rememberPwd=1" http://1.1.1.2/ac_portal/login.php>result.txt	
	set /p result=<result.txt
	set result=!result:~11,4!
	if !result! equ true (
		echo Login Success
	) else (
		echo Login Failed, Try Again
		choice /t 10 /d y /n >nul
		goto LoginCheck
	)
	del result.txt
)
endlocal

    Const wdExportFormatPDF = 17

	Set ppt = CreateObject("PowerPoint.application")
    Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")

        Set oDoc=oWord.Documents.Open(ff.Path)
        odoc.ExportAsFixedFormat Left(ff.Path,InStrRev(ff.Path,"."))&"pdf",wdExportFormatPDF
    End If
	If (LCase(Right(ff.Name,4))=".ppt" Or LCase(Right(ff.Name,4))="pptx" ) And Left(ff.Name,1)<>"~" Then
Set pptfile = ppt.Presentations.Open(ff.Path,false,false,false)
pptfile.Saveas Left(ff.Path,InStrRev(ff.Path,"."))&"pdf",32,false
End If
    Next
    odoc.Close
    oword.Quit
	pptfiles.Close
	ppt.Quit
    Set oDoc=Nothing
    Set oWord =Nothing
	Set pptfile = Nothing
	Set ppt = Nothing
	MsgBox "PPTå’ŒWordå…¨éƒ¨è½¬æ¢ä¸ºPDFå•¦!"

import asyncio
from playwright.async_api import async_playwright
import requests
import threading
import winsound
from plyer import notification
import easyocr
url=""
# åˆå§‹åŒ– EasyOCR
reader = easyocr.Reader(['ch_sim', 'en'])

async def notice_ti(page):
    # å°è¯•æŸ¥æ‰¾å›¾ç‰‡å…ƒç´ 
    elementimg = await page.query_selector_all('//*[@id="app"]/section/section[1]/section[2]/section/section/section/section[1]/section/div/section/section/img')
    if len(elementimg) == 0:
        elementimg = await page.query_selector_all('//*[@id="app"]/section/section[1]/section[2]/section/section/section/section[1]/section/section/section/section/img')

    # å‘é€æ–°é¡µé¢é€šçŸ¥
    notification.notify(title='æ–°çš„ä¸€é¡µ', message='æ–°çš„ä¸€é¡µ', app_icon=None, timeout=0.5)

    if elementimg:
        # è·å–å›¾ç‰‡åœ°å€
        img_url = await elementimg[0].get_attribute('src')
        # ç›´æ¥ä¸‹è½½å›¾ç‰‡
        tmp = requests.get(img_url)
        with open('tmp.png', 'wb') as f:
            f.write(tmp.content)

        # ä½¿ç”¨ EasyOCR è¯†åˆ«å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡å­—
        result = reader.readtext('tmp.png')
        # å¦‚æœ result ä¸­å«æœ‰â€˜å•é€‰â€™ã€â€˜å¤šé€‰â€™ã€â€˜åˆ¤æ–­â€™ã€â€˜å¡«ç©ºâ€™ã€â€˜æŠ•ç¥¨â€™ã€â€˜é—®ç­”â€™ã€â€˜ä½œä¸šâ€™ã€â€˜è®¨è®ºâ€™ã€â€˜å®éªŒâ€™ã€â€˜è¯¾ä»¶â€™ã€â€˜è¯¾ç¨‹â€™ã€â€˜æäº¤â€™ç­‰å…³é”®è¯ï¼Œå°±å‘é€é€šçŸ¥
        keywords = ['å•é€‰', 'å¤šé€‰', 'åˆ¤æ–­', 'å¡«ç©º', 'æŠ•ç¥¨', 'é—®ç­”', 'ä½œä¸š', 'è®¨è®º', 'å®éªŒ', 'æäº¤']
        #keywords = ['ç”µè§£']
        if any(x in str(result) for x in keywords):
            print(img_url)
            threading.Thread(target=lambda: winsound.Beep(440, 3000)).start()
            notification.notify(title='æœ‰é¢˜ï¼', message='æœ‰é¢˜ï¼', app_icon=None, timeout=0.5)
            # ai(result)
            # clear_page()

async def main():
    async with async_playwright() as p:
        # é…ç½®æµè§ˆå™¨é€‰é¡¹
        browser = await p.chromium.launch(headless=True)
        context = await browser.new_context(storage_state='state.json')
        page = await context.new_page()
        # æ‰“å¼€æŒ‡å®šé¡µé¢
        await page.goto(url)

        current_url = page.url
        while True:
            # ç­‰å¾… URL å˜åŒ–
            await page.wait_for_url(lambda url: url != current_url, timeout=10000000)
            current_url = page.url
            await notice_ti(page)
            #await print("å·²åˆ°è¾¾æ–°é¡µé¢")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    url=input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç½‘å€ï¼š")
    asyncio.run(main())

content: #include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; int d[500000*4],n,m=1; inline void build(int n){ while(m<=n)m<<=1; for(int i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++) cin>>d[i]; for(int i=m-1;i;--i) d[i]=d[i<<1]+d[i<<1|1]; } void chg(int x,int v){ d[x=m+x]+=v; while(x) d[x>>=1]=d[x<<1]+d[x<<1|1]; } int add(int x,int v){ for(int i=x+m;i;i>>=1)d[i]+=v; } int ask(int l,int r){ int ans=0; for(l=m+l-1,r=m+r+1 ; l^r^1 ; l>>=1,r>>=1){ if(~l&1)ans+=d[l^1]; if(r&1)ans+=d[r^1]; } return ans; } void debug(){ for(int i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++)cout<<d[i]<<" "; cout<<m<<endl; } int main(){ int q; cin>>n>>q; build(n); while(q--){ int op,a,b; cin>>op>>a>>b; if(op==1)add(a,b); else cout<<ask(a,b)<<endl; } }

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int d[500000*4],n,m=1;


inline void build(int n){
	while(m<=n)m<<=1;
    for(int i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++) cin>>d[i];
    for(int i=m-1;i;--i) d[i]=d[i<<1]+d[i<<1|1]; 
}  

void chg(int x,int v){
    d[x=m+x]+=v;
    while(x) d[x>>=1]=d[x<<1]+d[x<<1|1];
}  

int add(int x,int v){
	for(int i=x+m;i;i>>=1)d[i]+=v;
}
int ask(int l,int r){
int ans=0;
for(l=m+l-1,r=m+r+1 ; l^r^1 ; l>>=1,r>>=1){
	if(~l&1)ans+=d[l^1];
if(r&1)ans+=d[r^1];
}
return ans;
}
void debug(){
	for(int i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++)cout<<d[i]<<" ";
	cout<<m<<endl;
	
}
int main(){
int q;
cin>>n>>q;
build(n);
while(q--){
	int op,a,b;
	cin>>op>>a>>b;
	if(op==1)add(a,b);
	else cout<<ask(a,b)<<endl;
}


}

}

	while(m--){
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		printf("%d\n",get(a,b));

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const long long   N=100010,M=200011;
long long   head[N],ver[M],edge[M],Next[M],d[N];
long long   n,m,tot=0;
queue<long long >q;
bool v[N];
void add(long long   x,long long   y,long long   z){
	ver[++tot]=y;edge[tot]=z;Next[tot]=head[x];
	head[x]=tot;
}
int main(){
long long   i,j,n,m,a,b,c,s;
scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&m,&s);
while(m--){
scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&a,&b,&c);
add(a,b,c);
//	add(b,a,c);
}
memset(d,0x3f,sizeof(d));
memset(v,0,sizeof(v));
d[s]=0;
v[s]=1;
q.push(1);
while(q.size())
{
	long long   x=q.front();
	q.pop();
	v[x]=0;
	for(long long  i=head[x];i;i=Next[i])
	{long long   y=ver[i],z=edge[i];
	if(d[y]>d[x]+z){
		d[y]=d[x]+z;
		if(!v[y])
		{
			q.push(y);
			v[y]=1;
			
		}
	}
	}
	
	
}


for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
cout<<d[i]<<" ";


}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef int ll;

ll d[5010],mp[5010][5010];
bool v[5010];
ll i,j,n,m,t,k;

int main() {
	cin>>n>>m;
	memset(mp,0x3f,sizeof(mp));
	memset(d,0x3f,sizeof(d));
	memset(v,0,sizeof(v));
	ll a,b,c;

	for(i=1; i<=m; i++) {
		cin>>a>>b>>c;

		mp[a][b]=min(mp[a][b],c);

		mp[b][a]=mp[a][b];

	}

	d[1]=0;

	for(i=1; i<n; i++) {
		ll x=0;
		for(j=1; j<=n; j++)

			if(!v[j]&&(x==0||d[j]<d[x]))x=j;

		v[x]=1;
		for(j=1; j<=n; j++)

			if(!v[j])d[j]=min(d[j],mp[x][j]);

	}

	ll ans=0;
	for(i=2; i<=n; i++)
		ans+=d[i];
	
	if(ans>99999999)cout<<"orz";
	else cout<<ans;
	
	
}

content: #include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; priority_queue<pair<long long,long long> >q; vector<long long>ver[5010],edge[5010]; bool v[5010]; long long d[5010]; long long n,m; void add(long long x,long long y,long long z){ ver[x].push_back(y);edge[x].push_back(z); } void init(){ cin>>n>>m; for(long long i=1;i<=m;i++){ long long a,b,c; cin>>a>>b>>c; add(a,b,c);add(b,a,c); } } void work(){ memset(d,0x3f,sizeof(d)); memset(v,0,sizeof(v)); long long ans=0; d[1]=0; q.push(make_pair(0,1)); int cnt=0; while(q.size()){ long long x=q.top().second; q.pop(); if(v[x])continue; v[x]=1; cnt++; for(int i=ver[x].size()-1;i>=0;i--){ int y=ver[x][i],z=edge[x][i]; if(!v[y] &&(z<d[y])){ d[y]=z; q.push(make_pair(-d[y],y)); } } } for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)ans+=d[i]; if(cnt==n)cout<<ans; else cout<<"orz"; } int main(){ init(); work(); }
summary:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
priority_queue<pair<long long,long long> >q;
vector<long long>ver[5010],edge[5010];
bool v[5010];
long long d[5010];
long long n,m;
void add(long long x,long long y,long long z){
	ver[x].push_back(y);edge[x].push_back(z);
}
void init(){
	cin>>n>>m;
	for(long long i=1;i<=m;i++){
		long long a,b,c;
		cin>>a>>b>>c;
		add(a,b,c);add(b,a,c);
	}
}

void work(){
	memset(d,0x3f,sizeof(d));
	memset(v,0,sizeof(v));
	long long ans=0;
	d[1]=0;
	q.push(make_pair(0,1));
	int cnt=0;
	while(q.size()){
		long long x=q.top().second;
		q.pop();
		if(v[x])continue;
		v[x]=1;
		cnt++;
		for(int i=ver[x].size()-1;i>=0;i--){
		
			int y=ver[x][i],z=edge[x][i];
			if(!v[y] &&(z<d[y])){
				d[y]=z;
				q.push(make_pair(-d[y],y));
			}
		}
		
		
	}
for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)ans+=d[i];
if(cnt==n)cout<<ans;
else cout<<"orz";


}

int main(){
init();
work();

}

content: // luogu-judger-enable-o2 #include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; int ver[2*500000],nex[2*500000],head[2*500000],d[2*500000],p[2*500000][23],tot; void add(int x,int y){ ver[++tot]=y;nex[tot]=head[x];head[x]=tot; } int read(){ int x=0; char ch; while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')ch=getchar(); while(ch>'0'&&ch<'9'){ x=x*10+ch-'0'; ch=getchar(); } return x; } void dfs(int x,int fa){ d[x]=d[fa]+1; p[x][0]=fa; for(int i=1;(1<<i)<=d[x];i++) p[x][i]=p[p[x][i-1]][i-1]; for(int i=head[x];i;i=nex[i]){ if(ver[i]!=fa) dfs(ver[i],x);	} } int lca(int a,int b){ if(d[a]>d[b])swap(a,b); for(int i=20;i>=0;i--) if(d[a]<=d[b]-(1<<i)) b=p[b][i]; if(a==b) return a; for(int i=20;i>=0;i--) if(p[a][i]==p[b][i])continue; else a=p[a][i],b=p[b][i]; return p[a][0]; } int main(){ int i,j,n,m,t,k,s; scanf("%d %d %d",&n,&m,&s); for(int i=1;i<n;i++) { int a,b; scanf("%d %d",&a,&b); add(a,b); add(b,a); } dfs(s,0); for(i=1;i<=m;i++) { int a,b; scanf("%d %d",&a,&b); cout<<lca(a,b)<<endl; } }
summary:
// luogu-judger-enable-o2
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int ver[2*500000],nex[2*500000],head[2*500000],d[2*500000],p[2*500000][23],tot;
void add(int x,int y){
	ver[++tot]=y;nex[tot]=head[x];head[x]=tot;
}
int read(){
	int x=0;
	char ch;
	while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')ch=getchar();
	while(ch>'0'&&ch<'9'){
		x=x*10+ch-'0';
		ch=getchar();
	}
	return x;
}
void dfs(int x,int fa){
	d[x]=d[fa]+1;
	p[x][0]=fa;
	for(int i=1;(1<<i)<=d[x];i++)
	p[x][i]=p[p[x][i-1]][i-1];
	for(int i=head[x];i;i=nex[i]){
		if(ver[i]!=fa)
		dfs(ver[i],x);	
	}
}
int lca(int a,int b){
	if(d[a]>d[b])swap(a,b);
	for(int i=20;i>=0;i--)
	if(d[a]<=d[b]-(1<<i))
	b=p[b][i];
	if(a==b)
	return a;
	for(int i=20;i>=0;i--)
	if(p[a][i]==p[b][i])continue;
	else a=p[a][i],b=p[b][i];
	
	return p[a][0];
}
int main(){
	int i,j,n,m,t,k,s;
	scanf("%d %d %d",&n,&m,&s);
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		add(a,b);
		add(b,a);
	}
	dfs(s,0);
	for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		int a,b;
	scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		cout<<lca(a,b)<<endl;
	}
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool ver[1001][1001],v[1001];
int d[1001],n,m,e;
bool dfs(int x){
	for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){
	if(ver[x][i]&&!v[i]){
		v[i]=1;
		if(!d[i]||dfs(d[i])){
			d[i]=x;return 1;
		}
		
	}

	}
	return 0;
}
void init(){
cin>>n>>m>>e;
for(int i=1;i<=e;i++){
	int a,b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	if(b>m||a>n)continue;
	ver[a][b]=1;

}
	int ans=0;
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){memset(v,0,sizeof(v));
	ans+=dfs(i);
	}
	cout<<ans;
}
int main(){
init();
}

content: #include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; struct pl{ long long l,r,v,add,tim; #define l(x) tree[x].l #define r(x) tree[x].r #define v(x) tree[x].v #define add(x) tree[x].add }tree[4*100000]; long long a[100001]; void build(long long p,long long l,long long r){ l(p)=l;r(p)=r; if(l==r){ v(p)=a[l];return; } long long mid=(l+r)>>1; build(p<<1,l,mid); build((p<<1)+1,mid+1,r); v(p)=v(p*2)+v(p*2+1); } void spread(long long p){ if(add(p)==0)return; v(p*2)+=add(p)*(r(p*2)-l(p*2)+1); v(p*2+1)+=add(p)*(r(p*2+1)-l(p*2+1)+1); add(p*2)+=add(p); add(p*2+1)+=add(p); add(p)=0; } void chg(long long p,long long l,long long r,long long d){ if(l<=l(p)&&r>=r(p)){ v(p)+=d*(r(p)-l(p)+1); add(p)+=d; return; } spread(p); long long mid=(l(p)+r(p))>>1; if(l<=mid)chg(p*2,l,r,d); if(r>mid)chg(p*2+1,l,r,d); v(p)=v(p*2)+v(p*2+1); } long long ask(long long p,long long l,long long r){ if(l<=l(p)&&r>=r(p))return v(p); spread(p); long long mid=(l(p)+r(p))>>1; long long ans=0; if(l<=mid)ans+=ask(p*2,l,r); if(r>mid)ans+=ask(p*2+1,l,r); return ans; } int main(){ long long i,j,n,m,t,k; cin>>n>>m; for(i=1;i<=n;i++)cin>>a[i]; build(1,1,n); while(m--){ long long op,l,r,k; cin>>op>>l>>r; if(op==1){ cin>>k; chg(1,l,r,k); }else cout<<ask(1,l,r)<<endl;	} }
summary:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
struct pl{
	long long l,r,v,add,tim;
	#define l(x) tree[x].l
	#define r(x) tree[x].r
	#define v(x) tree[x].v
	#define add(x) tree[x].add
}tree[4*100000];
long long a[100001];
void build(long long p,long long l,long long r){
	l(p)=l;r(p)=r;
	if(l==r){
		v(p)=a[l];return;
	}
	long long mid=(l+r)>>1;
	build(p<<1,l,mid);
	build((p<<1)+1,mid+1,r);
	v(p)=v(p*2)+v(p*2+1);
}
void spread(long long p){
	if(add(p)==0)return;
	v(p*2)+=add(p)*(r(p*2)-l(p*2)+1);
	v(p*2+1)+=add(p)*(r(p*2+1)-l(p*2+1)+1);
	add(p*2)+=add(p);
	add(p*2+1)+=add(p);
	add(p)=0;
}
void chg(long long p,long long l,long long r,long long d){
	if(l<=l(p)&&r>=r(p)){
		v(p)+=d*(r(p)-l(p)+1);
		add(p)+=d;
		return;
	}
	spread(p);
	long long mid=(l(p)+r(p))>>1;
	if(l<=mid)chg(p*2,l,r,d);
	if(r>mid)chg(p*2+1,l,r,d);
	v(p)=v(p*2)+v(p*2+1);
}
long long ask(long long p,long long l,long long r){
	if(l<=l(p)&&r>=r(p))return v(p);
	spread(p);
	long long mid=(l(p)+r(p))>>1;
	long long ans=0;
	if(l<=mid)ans+=ask(p*2,l,r);
	if(r>mid)ans+=ask(p*2+1,l,r);
	return ans;
}
int main(){
long long i,j,n,m,t,k;
cin>>n>>m;
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)cin>>a[i];
build(1,1,n);
while(m--){
	long long op,l,r,k;
	cin>>op>>l>>r;
	if(op==1){
		cin>>k;
		chg(1,l,r,k);
	}else cout<<ask(1,l,r)<<endl;	
}
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long d[500000<<2],laz[500000<<2],n,m=1;;
void build(){
	while(m<=n)m<<=1;
	for(long long i=m+1;i<=m+n;i++)cin>>d[i];
	for(long long i=m-1;i>=1;i--)d[i]=d[i<<1]+d[i<<1|1];
}
long long get(long long x,long long y){
	long long ans=0,lc=0,rc=0,cnt=1;//cnt=1
	for(x+=m-1,y+=m+1; x^y^1; x>>=1,y>>=1,cnt<<=1){
		if(laz[x])ans+=laz[x]*lc;
		if(laz[y])ans+=laz[y]*rc;
		if(~x&1)ans+=d[x^1],lc+=cnt;
		if(y&1)ans+=d[y^1],rc+=cnt;
	}
	
		for(;x;x>>=1,y>>=1)ans+=laz[x]*lc,ans+=laz[y]*rc;
	return ans;
}
void add(long long x,long long y,long long v){
	long long ans=0,lc=0,rc=0,cnt=1;//cnt=1
	for(x+=m-1,y+=m+1; x^y^1; x>>=1,y>>=1,cnt<<=1){
		d[x]+=v*lc;d[y]+=v*rc;
		if(~x&1) laz[x^1]+=v,d[x^1]+=v*cnt,lc+=cnt;
		if(y&1)  laz[y^1]+=v,d[y^1]+=v*cnt,rc+=cnt;		

	}
for(;x;x>>=1,y>>=1)d[x]+=v*lc,d[y]+=v*rc;
}
int main(){
long long q;
cin>>n>>q;
build();
while(q--){
	long long a,b,op,c;
	cin>>op>>a>>b;
	if(op==1){
		cin>>c;
		add(a,b,c);
	}else{
		
		cout<<get(a,b)<<endl;
		
	}
	
	
}




}

content:
ç¬”è®°Realising the full potential of MR-PHeWAS in cancer. ï¸Â å‡ºç‰ˆå¹´ä»½: 2021\ å‡ºç‰ˆæœŸåˆŠ: British journal of cancer\ å½±å“å› å­: 8.8\ JCRåˆ†åŒº: 1\ DOI:10.1038/s41416-020-01165-0
æ–‡ç« ä½œè€…: Bowden Jack
æ‘˜è¦: MR-PHeWAS is a powerful new design for discovering causal mechanisms between a disease and its many candidate risk factors in a hypothesis-free manner. This technique has great potential in the field of cancer research, provided that both powerful and principled statistical approaches are used. ç»“è®º: â€œThis technique, termed â€˜MR-PheWASâ€™ (MR-phenomewide association study), is used to prioritise further epidemiological studies and has also been used to prioritise potential drug targets in the pharmaceutical arena.4â€ (Bowden, 2021, p. 1)
â€œnovel methods are urgently needed in order to fully exploit the MR-PHeWAS design.â€ (Bowden, 2021, p. 2)
åŸæ–‡æå‡ºMR-PHeWASçš„å±€é™æ€§ï¼š ç”±äºåˆ†ææ¬¡æ•°å¤š, Bonferroniæ£€éªŒè¿‡äºä¸¥æ ¼å¯¼è‡´æ²¡æœ‰é˜³æ€§ç»“æœï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ
â€œIn their analysis, no single phenotype was estimated to have a strong enough causal effect to fall below a pre-specified Bonferroni-adjusted 5% type I error threshold, although 13 phenotypes showed suggestive evidence of a causal association (P < 5%). Furthermore, when fully pleiotropy-robust MR methods were used, only telomere length, low-density lipoprotein and glycated haemoglobin remained suggestive. Although the analysis was inconclusive, and the methodology used sound, their work highlights a number of current limitations in the statistical methods routinely applied to MR-PHeWAS.â€ (Bowden, 2021, p. 1)
å¤šæ•°è¡¨å‹éƒ½æ˜¯ç”±å•ä¸€çš„SNPé©±åŠ¨ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å­˜åœ¨å¼‚è´¨æ€§ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ
â€œMany of the strongest results in their analysis were driven by a single variant (e.g. the effect of telomere length on glioma risk through the TERT gene), but the precision of their overall causal effect was dramatically diminished due to the presence of substantial heterogeneity across the remaining SNPs. Modern MR approaches generally utilise large numbers of SNPs, but interpret heterogeneity in causal estimates across SNPs as a sign of horizontal pleiotropy.3â€ (Bowden, 2021, p. 1)
3. å¦‚ä½•ä»å¤§é‡çš„æœ‰biasçš„æ•°æ®ä¸­åˆ†ç¦»å‡ºå«å°éƒ¨åˆ†çš„å¯é æ•°æ®ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ
â€œHowever, they still assume that the majority of the genetic signals are correct, or they are all correct â€˜on averageâ€™. This may be true, but it could also be the case, for example, that TERT is the only reliable genetic instrument in the analysis. This presents a future challenge for MR approaches in being able to separate out the small kernel of truth in a larger sea of biased data.â€ (Bowden, 2021, p. 1)
æ€»ç»“ æˆ‘çš„æƒ³æ³•: Bonferroniæ£€éªŒè¿‡äºä¸¥æ ¼ï¼Œé‚£å°±è¯•è¯•æ›´åŠ å®½æ¾çš„å¤šé‡æ£€éªŒæ–¹æ³• æ¯”å¦‚FDR

library("clusterProfiler")

library("org.Hs.eg.db")

#è½¬æ¢ID

genelist <- data.frame(ID = id.fc$gene, logFC = id.fc$logFC)
row.names(genelist)=genelist[,1]

class Net(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super(Net, self).__init__()
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(2, 40)
        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(40, 40)
        self.fc3 =nn.Linear(40, 24)
        self.fc4 =nn.Linear(24, 1)
    def forward(self,x):
        return self.fc4(t.relu(self.fc3(t.relu(self.fc2(t.relu(self.fc1(x)))))))

def train(epoch,model,opt,lossfn,tu,tc):
    for i in range(1,epoch+1):
        tp=model(tu)
        loss=lossfn(tp,tc)
        opt.zero_grad()
        loss.backward()
        opt.step()
        if i % 10 == 0 or i == 1:
            print('Epoch %d, Loss %f' % (i, float(loss)))
    return model
def f(x,x2):
    return x**2+x2

PATH = "cyNN.pt"
cyNN=t.load(PATH)
cyNN.eval()
opt=optim.Adam(cyNN.parameters(),lr=1e-7)

import torch as t
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.optim as optim

def training_loop(n_epochs, optimizer, model,loss_fn, t_u, t_c):
    for epoch in range(1, n_epochs + 1):
        t_p = model(t_u)          #è®¡ç®—å½“å‰æ¨¡å‹çš„é¢„æµ‹å€¼
        loss = loss_fn(t_p, t_c)  #è®¡ç®—æŸå¤±å‡½æ•°
        optimizer.zero_grad()   
        loss.backward()   #å›æº¯ç´¯è®¡æŸå¤±
        optimizer.step()
        if epoch % 50 == 0:
            print('Epoch %d, Loss %f' % (epoch, float(loss)))
    return model


epoches=30000  #è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•° ä¸€èˆ¬æ¬¡æ•°é€‚ä¸­ï¼Œä¸ºé˜²æ­¢è¿‡åº¦æ‹Ÿåˆä¸å»ºè®®è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•°è¿‡å¤š
num=50000  #éšæœºç”Ÿæˆçš„æ ·æœ¬æ•° ä¸€èˆ¬è¶Šå¤šè¶Šå¥½ï¼Œçœ‹è¿è¡Œé…ç½®

learning_rate=1e-4   #å­¦ä¹ ç‡ï¼ˆæ•°å€¼è¶Šå¤§å­¦å¾—è¶Šå¿«ï¼ˆä½†ä¸ä¸€å®šå‡†ç¡®ï¼‰ï¼Œæ•°å€¼è¶Šå°æ‹Ÿåˆè¶Šå¥½ï¼ˆæ—¶é—´è¾ƒé•¿ï¼‰ï¼‰å»ºè®®å– 1e-2 ã€1e-3ã€1e-4ã€1e-5

x = t.randn(num, 1)
def f(x):
    return 30 * x + 10
    #å¾…æ‹Ÿåˆçš„å¼å­ä¸º y=30*x +10  å¯è‡ªè¡Œä¿®æ”¹if you likeã€‚


y = f(x)+ t.randn(num, 1)*10  #  åé¢çš„ t.randn(num, 1)*10 æ˜¯åç¦»å€¼ï¼Œé™ä½è®­ç»ƒçš„ç²¾ç¡®æ€§ï¼ˆç»™ä½ çš„æ¨¡å‹æ›´å¤šçš„æŒ‘æˆ˜ï¼‰
linear_model = nn.Linear(1, 1)
optimizer = optim.SGD(linear_model.parameters(), lr=learning_rate)
training_loop(n_epochs=epoches,optimizer=optimizer,model=linear_model,loss_fn=nn.MSELoss(),t_u=x,t_c=y)
print('\n')
#print(linear_model.weight)
#print(linear_model.bias)

while(1):
    x=float(input('è¯·è¾“å…¥æƒ³é¢„æµ‹çš„xå€¼ï¼š'))
    tmp=float(linear_model(t.tensor([x]))[0])
    print("æ‹Ÿåˆå€¼:",tmp)
    print("çœŸå®å€¼:",f(x))
    print("ç›¸å¯¹è¯¯å·®:",1-tmp/f(x))
    print('\n')

#!/usr/bin/env python
#coding:utf-8
import socket
import sys
import re
import os
import time
import select
import threading

HEADER_SIZE = 4096

host = '0.0.0.0'
port = 8000

#å­è¿›ç¨‹è¿›è¡Œsocket ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚
def http_socket(client, addr):
    #åˆ›å»º select æ£€æµ‹ fd åˆ—è¡¨
    inputs  = [client]
    outputs = []
    remote_socket = 0
    print("client connent:{0}:{1}".format(addr[0], addr[1]))
    while True:
        readable, writable, exceptional = select.select(inputs, outputs, inputs)
        try:
            for s in readable:
            	if s is client:
                	#è¯»å– http è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¿¡æ¯
                	request_header = s.recv(HEADER_SIZE)
                	if remote_socket is 0:
                    	#æ‹†åˆ†å¤´ä¿¡æ¯
                    	host_addr = request_header.split("\r\n")[1].split(":")
                    	#å¦‚æœæœªæŒ‡å®šç«¯å£åˆ™ä¸ºé»˜è®¤ 80
                    	if 2 == len(host_addr):
                        	host_addr.append("80")
                    	name, host, port = map(lambda x: x.strip(), host_addr)
                    	#å»ºç«‹ socket tcp è¿æ¥
                    	sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
                    	sock.connect((host, int(port)))
                    	remote_socket = sock
                    	inputs.append(sock)
                	#å‘é€åŸå§‹è¯·æ±‚å¤´
                	remote_socket.sendall(request_header)
            	else:
                	#æ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®å¹¶å‘é€ç»™æµè§ˆå™¨
                	while(True):
                    	resp = s.recv(512)
                    	if resp:
                        	client.sendall(resp)
                		else:
                    		break
    	except Exception as e:
        	print("http socket error {0}".format(e))

#åˆ›å»ºsocketå¯¹è±¡
http_server = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
try:
	http_server.bind((host, port))
except:
	sys.exit("python proxy bind error ")

print("python proxy start")

http_server.listen(1024)

while True:
	client, addr = http_server.accept()
	http_thread = threading.Thread(target=http_socket, args=(client, addr))
	http_thread.start()
	time.sleep(1)

#å…³é—­æ‰€æœ‰è¿æ¥
http_server.close()
print("python proxy close")

# æ¥æ”¶å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä¿¡æ¯
 client_socket, client_ip = tcp_server_socket.accept()

# å…³é—­å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¿æ¥

import scrapy
from FG1.items import Fg1Item

class FgSpider(scrapy.Spider):
	name = "FG"
	allowed_domains = ["fitgirl-repacks.site"]
	start_urls = ["http://fitgirl-repacks.site/"]

	def parse(self, response):
    	for i in range(1,350):
       		yield scrapy.Request("https://fitgirl-repacks.site/page/"+str(i)+'/',callback=self.parse_page)
    	pass
	def parse_page(self, response):
    	for each in response.xpath("//article"):
        	item=Fg1Item()
        	item['tle']=each.xpath("header/h1/a/text()").extract()
        	item['info']=each.xpath("div/ul[1]").extract()
        	yield item
